channel.description: Recent content in Devblogs.microsoft.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Introducing the Microsoft 365 Agents Toolkit
item.description: Read how the Microsoft 365 Agents Toolkit, an evolution of Microsoft Teams Toolkit, is designed to help developers build agents and apps for Microsoft 365 Copilot, Microsoft Teams, and Microsoft 365. Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/microsoft365dev/introducing-the-microsoft-365-agents-toolkit

item.title: Azure DevOps with GitHub Repositories â€“ Your path to Agentic AI
item.description: GitHub Copilot has evolved beyond a coding assistant in the IDE into an agentic teammate â€“ providing actionable feedback on pull requests, fixing bugs and implementing new features, creating pull requests and responding to feedback, and much more. These new capabilities will transform every aspect of the software development lifecycle, as we are already seeing [â€¦] Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/blog/azure-devops-with-github-repositories-your-path-to-agentic-ai

item.title: Announcing Azure Command Launcher for Java
item.description: Optimizing JVM Configuration for Azure Deployments Tuning the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) for cloud deployments is notoriously challenging. Over 30% of developers tend to deploy Java workloads with no JVM configuration at all, therefore relying on the default settings of the HotSpot JVM. The default settings in OpenJDK are intentionally conservative, designed to work across [â€¦] Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/java/announcing-azure-command-launcher-for-java

item.title: .NET Aspire 9.3 is here and enhanced with GitHub Copilot!

item.title: Announcing the General Availability (GA) of JSON data type & JSON aggregatesâ€¦
item.description: We are excited to announce the General Availability (GA) of the native JSON data type and JSON aggregates â€“ JSON_OBJECTAGG & JSON_ARRAYAGG. You can use the JSON data type and JSON aggregates to integrate and work with JSON documents more efficiently in the database. This functionality is available in Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Managed [â€¦] Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/azure-sql/announcing-the-general-availability-ga-of-json-data-type-json-aggregates

item.title: GitHub Copilot: Exploring Agent Mode and MCP Support in Public Preview for Xcode
item.description: Weâ€™re excited to announce that GitHub Copilotâ€™s Agent Mode and Model Context Protocol (MCP) support are now available in public preview for Xcode! This brings powerful autonomous coding capabilities to macOS developers using Xcode. What is Agent Mode? Agent Mode turns GitHub Copilot into an intelligent pair programmer that can understand your intent, plan multi-step [â€¦] Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/xcode/github-copilot-exploring-agent-mode-and-mcp-support-in-public-preview-for-xcode

item.title: Unlocking the Power of Regex in SQL Server
item.description: Regular expressions, or regex, are powerful tools for text manipulation and pattern matching. They are incredibly useful in various scenarios, such as data validation, extraction, and transformation. SQL Server 2025 introduces native support for regex functions, making it easier to perform complex text operations directly within SQL queries. This Regex support is available in SQL [â€¦] Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/azure-sql/unlocking-the-power-of-regex-in-sql-server

item.title: Edit is now open source
item.description: What is Edit? Edit is a new command-line text editor in Windows. Edit is open source, so you can build the code or install the latest version from GitHub! This CLI text editor will be available to preview in the Windows Insider Program in the coming months. After that, it will ship as part of [â€¦] Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/commandline/edit-is-now-open-source

Weâ€™ve streamlined how you build and modernize MongoDB applications in the cloud with our managed service- vCore-based Azure Cosmos [â€¦] Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/cosmosdb/accelerating-mongodb-development-on-azure-whats-new-at-microsoft-build-2025

item.title: Supercharge AI development with new AI-powered features in Microsoft Dev Box
item.description: AI is reshaping how we build, deploy, and scale software. As more apps become AI-powered, developers need environments that can keep up with speed and demands of innovation. item.title: Evaluating content safety in your .NET AI applications

item.title: How do I force RunOnce commands to run in a specific order?
item.description: Run them in the desired order yourself. Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20250515-00/?p=111181

item.title: Cloud infrastructure provisioning: best practices for IaC
item.description: Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) is a common DevOps practice that enterprises use to provision and deploy IT infrastructure. Enterprises applying IaC and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines can maintain high availability and manage risk for their cloud environments at scale. However, multi-environment challenges, manual processes, and fragmented guidance still lead to configuration drift, errors, and inconsistencies. These issues are likely to result in downtime, security vulnerabilities, and inefficient resource utilization. Link to article: https://devblogs.

item.title: If I mark my thread pool callback as long-running, does it still count toward the thread pool thread limit?
item.description: Yes, because it's still in the thread pool. Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20250514-00/?p=111178

item.title: .NET and .NET Framework May 2025 servicing releases updates

item.title: Accelerate AI Applications with Semantic Caching on Azure Managed Redis
item.description: In this blog, we will look at implementing the Semantic caching use case using Azure Managed Redis. Azure has been at the forefront of providing caching solutions for over a decade with the Azure Cache for Redis enterprise. This service empowered developers with a high-performance, scalable cache that significantly enhanced the responsiveness of their applications. [â€¦] Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/all-things-azure/accelerate-ai-applications-with-semantic-caching-on-azure-managed-redis

item.title: Now Generally Available: Apple identity provider support for Microsoft Entra External ID
item.description: I'm excited to announce that "Sign in with Apple" is now generally available for external tenants in Entra External ID. The feature has been in public preview since February, and many customers have already integrated Apple as an identity provider for their applications. Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/identity/now-generally-available-apple-identity-provider-support-for-microsoft-entra-external-id
